snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a look at an undersea research habitat, the hunt for predators online and a dispatch from a tech writer taking a...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a look at an undersea research habitat, the hunt for predators online and a dispatch from a tech writer taking a yearlong hiatus from the Internet.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: In an Octopus's Garden, and an Offline Life
